document.full_text: the frothy market for internet ipos is raising the specter of a bubble, underscoring how little has changed despite lawsuits and investigations in the wake of the 1990s dot-com craze.
document.title: analysis: soaring ipos raise specter of new bubble
lines_and_colors: the frothy market for internet ipos is raising the specter of a bubble, underscoring how little has changed despite lawsuits and investigations in the wake of the 1990s dot-com craze.
